body:
I believe just like reddit, voat, and other sites, ruqqus is just (on the political side) a hivemind by this point.
Is it as bad as reddit? Probably not, however I'd say it's not good either.
I still like ruqqus but I just don't feel like it's as good when it was a smaller community than it was now, as opinions weren't entirely shut down from the get go like with reddit and voat.

Footnote: This is an opinion, not fact.
body_html:
I believe just like reddit, voat, and other sites, ruqqus is just (on the political side) a hivemind by this point. Is it as bad as reddit? Probably not, however I'd say it's not good either. I still like ruqqus but I just don't feel like it's as good when it was a smaller community than it was now, as opinions weren't entirely shut down from the get go like with reddit and voat.

Footnote: This is an opinion, not fact.

guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.description_html: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

title: Ruqqus is a hivemind just as reddit and voat are

body:
It's not as bad as Voat was (it shut down on Christmas). There the CCP system was set up to where people that disagreed were limited to one comment per day for most of the site's existence if they were driven into negative CCP. This meant in effect that you couldn't post there if you disagreed with the site's dominant neo-Nazi narrative. 

At least on Ruqqus Democrats or other dissidents can post freely. But I think the tendency is for likeminded people to group together. So these hiveminds should not be surprising.
body_html:

body:
I agree and especially like Ruqqus for that reason despite the hivemind tendencies. 
Quite sad though that hiveminds would form like that in the first place, I fear it'll just become like Reddit (if it survives long enough) in terms of how bad the hivemind is if it becomes really big.

author.bio: Considering whether to delete my account. Decided to just set my profile private for now.
author.bio_html: Considering whether to delete my account. Decided to just set my profile private for now.

body:
Meh, I don't know about that. People rarely agree with me on here and I'm not only still around, I have slightly positive rep.

The best antidote to a hive mind is to just let everyone speak their piece. It's limiting your association to people who agree with you that creates the hive mind.

body: I disagree with your perception. Reddit has been banning conservatives for being conservatives and holding conservative opinions. Ruqqus users are currently mostly conservatives but that just happens to be so, it's not a hivemind like in other places. Anyone can have their opinions and debate them here. Try that in other places and soon you will find yourself banned because those hiveminds don't tolerate diversity of opinion.
body_html: I disagree with your perception. Reddit has been banning conservatives for being conservatives and holding conservative opinions. Ruqqus users are currently mostly conservatives but that just happens to be so, it's not a hivemind like in other places. Anyone can have their opinions and debate them here. Try that in other places and soon you will find yourself banned because those hiveminds don't tolerate diversity of opinion.

body:
Yeah. The exile feature even very arguably works against preventing a hivemind - or even allowing dissidents to speak freely. If right-wingers control the large majority of the guilds it's easy to see what can happen to liberals.

I still think it's better than Voat though.
